timeline.bodyHTML:
I think the comment on "partial streak missiles" refers to iATMs firing either as streak missiles (direct fire) or as cluster weapons (indirect fire). I would say that when firing as streak they are unaffected by glancing blows, but in the case of indirect fire they would get the damage reduction (since attacks against conventional infantry don't use the cluster table).

Suggested change
toReturn = applyGlancingBlowModifier(toReturn, false);
if (streakInactive()) {
toReturn = applyGlancingBlowModifier(toReturn, true);
}
